situation: Not being able to find a job after graduating from university

rewrite_iterations.rewritten_text: I can see how challenging this situation is for you. One option could be to apply for part-time jobs that align with your skills while also setting specific times each week to focus on your full-time applications. This way, you can manage your immediate financial needs while still pursuing your long-term goals.
rewrite_iterations.reasoning: The original response was overly focused on empathy without providing practical help, violating the requirement for a concrete element. I included one brief empathy sentence and offered a short guide to help the seeker decide on their job situation.

rewrite_iterations.rewritten_text: I can see how challenging this situation is for you. One approach could be to first identify a couple of part-time jobs that interest you, then set aside specific hours each week dedicated solely to your full-time applications. This way, you can balance your financial needs with your career aspirations.
rewrite_iterations.reasoning: The original supporter response lacked practical help despite the seeker's explicit request for assistance. I retained a brief empathetic validation and added a short 2-3 step guide to provide concrete help on managing part-time and full-time applications.

final_result.label: normal
final_result.response: I can see how challenging this situation is for you. One approach could be to first identify a couple of part-time jobs that interest you, then set aside specific hours each week dedicated solely to your full-time applications. This way, you can balance your financial needs with your career aspirations.
